controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class to handle the delegations between the Model and View package.

    Deals with Game Loop game logic

    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949, Reuben Puketapu - 300310939, Divya Patel - 300304450, Ellie Coyle - 300307071
